name: Ananteshesha
description:
Links : Discord I Youtube I Patreon

Inspired by Addendum 3000.1, Anantashesha is a horror game set in an atmosphere of the deep sea and desperation. After initial discovery, three members of Orion-9 “Kingfishers” tasked to contact Anantashesha by diving to the surface of the Bay of Bengal. As Bravo, you will navigate through an increasingly volatile world as you find yourself confronted on all sides by a panicked, desperate population and an unpredictable, ruthless Alien.

After initial discovery, three members of Orion-9 “Kingfishers” tasked to contact Anantashesha by diving to the surface of the Bay of Bengal. Although their journey will not be easy as they will face with unknown powers...

Minimum System Requirements

  • OS : Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM or higher
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 720M or higher

A game by Digital Raven
